questions: How do I unlock the scooter?
What do I do at the end of the ride?
My scooter is broken / not working, what do I do?
How can I help the project?
answers: Nope, we would like you to but you are not obligated.
freeTxt: Yep, free. Rides are capped at 20 mins and you can ride every 2 hours. We ask that you make a donation at the end of your ride, but you don't have to.
OSTxt: The plans and source code for this project are completely open and free to use. Go ahead and start your own scooter share.
charityTxt: At the end of your ride, you can choose which charity you would like your donation to go to.
